reviews.review: One of the best, if not the best FPS of all time. If you haven't played this series, I can't recommend it enough.
Born playing this game, still replay it 20 years later, best game ever! Always will be waiting for 3 no matter what!

If you're viewing this game from the time it game out, I'm told it's groundbreaking.  If you're viewing this game from, say, 2015, I found it a bit tedious.  The guns are fun to shoot, the FPS action is really pretty solid, and the graphics still hold up for me.  But some of the levels, like the never ending boat sequences, or the weird semi-platforming thing where I had to avoid sandworms or whatever, were far too tedious for my modern sensibilities.

Still, I respect this game for its place in history, and its engine for all the games it would go on to host.  I recommend you play this so you can say you played it.  Also, I think everyone probably has five copies of this by now...
